#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int lucky(int r)
{
        if(r < 10)
                return r;
        else {
                int u;
                int sum=0;
                while(r>0) {
                        u = r%10;
                        r = r/10;
                        sum = sum+u;
                }
        lucky(sum);
        }
}
int main()
{
        int p,q,l,g;
        char a[20];
        scanf("%d %s %d",&p,a,&q);
        if(a[0] == 'J'){
                if (strlen(a) != 4)
                        l=1;
                else if(a[2] == 'n')
                        l=6;
                else
                        l=7;
        }
        if(a[0] == 'F')
                l=2;
        if (a[0] == 'M') {
                if(strlen(a)==5)
                        l=3;
                else
                        l=5;
        }
        if (a[0] == 'A') {
                if(strlen(a)==5)
                        l=4;
                else
                        l=8;
        }
        if (a[0] == 'S')
                l=9;
        if (a[0] == 'O')
                l=10;
        if (a[0]=='N')
                l=11;
        if (a[0]=='D')
                l=12;
        g = lucky((p*l)+q);
        printf("%d\n",g);
        return 0;
}
